Text: Next Wednesdays Meeting Agenda Cc Michelle Sorry for the delay in getting this to you The following is a partial list of items that Williams would like to discuss in our meeting on Wednesday November th at am Other questions will probably surface as we move through our discussion I would like to start with an overview of the OBA and why the change And as we go through the new OBA these questions can be addressed as we get to the appropriate section Does that work for you Methodology of clearing the ending imbalance as of November th How does WFS pay back the old imbalance while also delivering volumes on the new OBA How will payback be scheduled when your line runs full all of the time We currently net all of the points in the San Juan area Will this still be the case How do we handle situations that have occurred multiple times this week where TRW has lost compression If this occurs after Intraday how do we makeup during the rest of the month if you cannot accept payback When an under delivery occurs who determines the responsible party and how will the associated volume be excluded from penalty when caused by Transwestern What happens when Transwestern accepts Intraday nom increases but cannot accept the physical flow needed to rate out the day How do you propose we track separate volumes imbalances depending on who caused the shortfall Please call if my questions need clarification Thanks Greg Poynter Midstream Gas Management Gas Control WS th Floor w cell
